Description: Identify compromised user and their accesses
Content: Identfiy the employee that was phished. Which services does the employee have access to?

Description: Notify employees about ongoing phishing attack
Content: Notify employees of the ongoing phishing attack, provide guidance on what to do if they received the email or opened the attachment, and remind them to remain vigilant for future phishing attempts.

Let the employee know that their account is phished. Talk about the incident. What made the employee click the link? What could have been done to prevent this? Collect information, to help prevent future phishing attacks.
The email (.eml), the link, the IP address, the domain, the email address, the attachment, etc.
Disk and memory dump of affected devices.
Lock all accounts that the employee has access to. Force password reset.
Perform a complete reinstallation of the employee computer to remove any potential infections.
